Files.Description: Check if input is a numeric or logical square matrix.

Files.Description: Check if the matrix is square and non-negative.

Files.Description: Check if the matrix (I-A) is non-singular.

Files.Description: Check if 'obj' is a valid TaesLab object.

Files.Name: vDivide
Files.Description: Element-wise division with NaN handling for 0/0 cases.

Files.Name: divideCol
Files.Description: Divide each column of matrix A by corresponding element of vector x.

Files.Name: divideRow
Files.Description: Divide each row of matrix A by corresponding element of vector x.

Files.Name: scaleCol
Files.Description: Multiply each column of matrix A by corresponding element of vector x.

Files.Name: scaleRow
Files.Description: Multiply each row of matrix A by corresponding element of vector x.

Files.Name: tolerance
Files.Description: Compute relative tolerance value for a matrix.

Files.Name: zerotol
Files.Description: Set matrix values near zero to exact zero.

Files.Name: inverseMatrixOperator
Files.Description: Calculate the inverse of the M-Matrix (I-A).

Files.Name: logicalMatrix
Files.Description: Convert numeric matrix to logical with zero tolerance.

Files.Description: Transform resource-driven matrix to demand-driven form.

Files.Description: Convert resource-driven operator to demand-driven operator.

Files.Name: similarResourceMatrix
Files.Description: Compute resource-driven matrix from demand-driven matrix.

Files.Name: similarResourceOperator
Files.Description: Compute resource-driven operator from demand-driven operator.

Files.Name: transitiveClosure
Files.Description: Compute the transitive closure of a directed graph.

Files.Name: buildMessage
Files.Description: Build error messages for TaesLab functions.

Files.Name: fdisplay
Files.Description: Display a matrix A using C-like formatting.
